data.title: Total Synthesis of (â)-Glionitrin A and B Enabled by an Asymmetric Oxidative Sulfenylation of Triketopiperazines
data.meta_description:
Total
Synthesis of (â)-Glionitrin A and B Enabled
by an Asymmetric Oxidative Sulfenylation of Triketopiperazines
data.text: Asymmetric construction of dithiodiketopiperazines on otherwise achiral scaffolds remains a pivotal synthetic challenge encountered in many biologically significant natural products. Herein, we report the first total syntheses of (â)-glionitrin A/B and revise the absolute configurations. Emerging from the study is a novel oxidative sulfenylation of triketopiperazines that enables asymmetric formation of dithiodiketoÂ­piperazines on sensitive substrates. The concise route paves the way for further studies on the potent antimicrobial and antitumor activities of glionitrin A and the intriguing ability of glionitrin B to inhibit invasive ability of cancer cells.
